name: NIST Artificial Intelligence Risk Management Framework
provider: National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST)
use_case: Voluntary framework for managing risks posed by AI systems across their lifecycle.
data_summary: Encourages documenting data provenance, quality, and governance as part of AI risk management.
compliance_materials: Incident response and impact reporting procedures
monitoring: Promotes continuous monitoring of AI systems' performance, impacts, and risk controls.
emergency_plan: Recommends escalation, mitigation, and communication plans for AI-related incidents.
obligations: Map AI risks by context, stakeholders, and system characteristics.
Measure risks and effectiveness of controls using qualitative and quantitative metrics.
Manage risks through governance policies, controls, and iterative improvement.
penalties: Not applicable; voluntary framework without statutory penalties.
